snippet: The modest bump in sales follows a 0.5 percent increase in the previous quarter, making it the first time since 2010 that Olive Garden achieved consecutive quarters of sales gains.
abstract: Olive Garden reports quarterly sales were up 2.2 percent at established locations, first back-to-back reported quarterly gains in five years.
lead_paragraph: The modest bump in sales follows a 0.5 percent increase in the previous quarter, making it the first time since 2010 that Olive Garden achieved consecutive quarters of sales gains.

headline.main: Olive Garden Sales Up for 2nd Quarter in Row
headline.print_headline: Olive Garden Sales Up for 2nd Quarter in Row
